/86 5 cm wide by 37 /94 cm caron latch hook kits long including border shaggy caron® classics natura® materials wonderart® caron international s simply soft 100% acrylic 6 oz/170 g 315 yd/288 m krafty kids® skein christmas designs #9719 soft pink 3 skeins #9702 off white 3 skeins one size us j/10 6 mm or size to obtain gauge buy all your favorite one size us h/8 5 mm for border caron products online yarn needle gauge gauge is not critical for this project in stitch pattern 13 sts and 18 1/2 row = 4 /10 cm using larger hook stitches used chain chain double_crochet double_crochet http //www caron com/projects/slip_stitch/soften_their_world html page 1 of 3 caron international yarns and latch hook kits 09/13/2007 01 19 pm single_crochet single_crochet abbreviation modified front post double_crochet mod fpdc note unlike a standard fpdc the st behind the posted st is not skipped but is worked as part of the modified fpdc this will eliminate the hole on the reverse side which normally occurs when working posted sts and the reverse side will lay flat rs yarn over insert hook from rs to ws at the side of the st indicated bring hook around ws of st returning to rs on the opposite side of the st yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and draw through 2 loops on hook insert hook into top of next single_crochet of current row behind fpdc yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and draw through 3 loops on hook stitch pattern multiple of 4 sts row 1 using a single_crochet in second chain from hook * double_crochet in each of next 2 chain single_crochet in each of next 2 chain repeat from * across to last 3 chain double_crochet in each of next 2 chain single_crochet in last chain turn row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in each st across changing to b in last st see notes turn row 3 using b chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet * work mod fpdc around each of next 2 double_crochet in second row below row 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet repeat from * across to last 3 sts work mod fpdc around each of next 2 double_crochet in second row below single_crochet in last single_crochet turn row 4 repeat row 2 changing to a on last single_crochet turn row 5 using a chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet * work mod
